channel.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [RBX8][HostedPrivateCloud] - Network equipement operation
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT May 14, 04:00 - 13:00 UTC

May 3, 02:01 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 14/05/2024 04:00 UTC
End time : 14/05/2024 13:00 UTC
Service impact : Customers might experience twice of a few seconds of input/output freeze for storage equipment during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be doing an internal maintenance on a network equipment.

item.title: [RBX8][Hosted Private Cloud] - Rack R806L19
item.description:
May 6, 15:16 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 06/05/2024 11:48 UTC
End Time : 06/05/2024 15:08 UTC
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

May 6, 12:07 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 06/05/2024 11:48 UTC
Service impact : Some hosts located in rack R806L19 are temporarily unreachable
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

item.title: [HostedPrivateCloud] - VMware vCenter Server + Hosts upgrade
item.description:
May 6, 06:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Apr 30, 21:34 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

Start time : 06/05/2024 06:00 UTC
End time : 10/05/2024 16:00 UTC
Service impact : Management unavailable for 1h and all hosts will be put in maintenance (Vmotion).
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for hosts and vCenter Server services . An individual communication will be sent before the upgrade begins.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [EU/CA][Veeam] - Veeam Managed major upgrade
item.description:
Apr 30, 16:07 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Apr 18, 20:35 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Apr 18, 20:34 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Veeam managed offer.
The maintenance itself will take around 5 hour to be done.

This may temporarily affect some functionality.

Start time : 18/04/2024 06:00 UTC
End time : 30/04/2024 16:00 UTC
Service impact : Backup and restore wont be available during the maintenance.
Service improvement : We are rolling out a major upgrade for our Veaam Managed Solution.

Thank you for your understanding.
